definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 31:10 merchandise, value;—´[[מ]] abs. Ne 13:16; [[מִכְרָהּ]] Pr 31:10; [[מִכְרָם]] Nu 20:19; prob. also [[מִמְכָּרָיו]] (rd. [[מִמְּכָרָיו]]) De 18:8, v. Di Dr;—
merchandise Ne 13:16; value, price, of water Nu 20:19 (JE), cf. De 18:8 (v. supr.); of capable woman Pr 31:10.
